key.name: use-custom-file
key.summary: Use an alternative file for shortcut descriptions
key.description: If true the shortcut file specified as shortcuts-file will be used for custom shortcuts.

key.name: shortcuts-file
key.description: If not empty it points to the shortcut file that will be read for the shortcut descriptions.

key.name: inner-boxlayout-count
key.description: Defines the number of panels (columns) used to display the keyboard shortcuts in the overlay.

key.name: show-description-first
key.summary: Show shortcut description before key combination
key.description: If true the shortcut description will be displayed before the key combination.
